name: Daily standup summary
description: Sends a daily summary to your Slack standup channel every weekday at 9 AM with an overview of completed and newly created Linear issues from the previous day. The summary includes counts and lists the top 5 items in each category, helping your team start the day with a clear picture of progress and new work items.

steps.name: Get Yesterday Date
steps.description: Calculates yesterday's date for filtering issues

steps.name: Get Completed Issues
steps.description: Fetches all Linear issues completed yesterday
steps.code: const issues = await tenant.linear.api.issues.list({ filter: { completedAt: { gte: yesterdayStart, lte: yesterdayEnd } } });

steps.name: Get Created Issues
steps.description: Fetches all Linear issues created yesterday
steps.code: const issues = await tenant.linear.api.issues.list({ filter: { createdAt: { gte: yesterdayStart, lte: yesterdayEnd } } });

steps.name: Format Standup Summary
steps.description: Builds a formatted summary message with issue counts and lists

steps.name: Send Standup Summary
steps.description: Posts the summary to the designated Slack standup channel
steps.code: await tenant.slack.api.messages.post({ channel: slackChannel, text: summary });
